examples: My knowledge of French is pretty basic.
The girls looked so pretty in their summer dresses.
The board meeting painted a pretty grim picture.
Those movie stars live pretty high off the hog.
Years of war have left their mark on these pretty islands.
words.defineEn: (of a woman or a child) attractive without being very beautiful
words.defineVi: (của một người phụ nữ hoặc một đứa trẻ) hấp dẫn mà không quá xinh đẹp

examples: Joe Biden also had a role model: Irish, Catholic, good-looking.
I think this is one of the best-looking SUVs available right now, but there is a Range Rover that is pretty good-looking as well.
words.defineEn: someone who has an attractive and pleasing appearance
words.defineVi: một người có vẻ ngoài hấp dẫn và dễ chịu

examples: Handsome, she thought, but not a patch on Alex.
With a wave of her magic wand, she changed the frog into a handsome prince.
He may have been handsome, but that was not enough to make up for his lack of character.
After all, handsome is as handsome does.
After all, handsome is as handsome does.
words.defineEn: (of a man) having an attractive face and body
words.defineVi: (của một người đàn ông) có khuôn mặt và thân hình hấp dẫn

examples: The tall building stands out among the other structures in the city.
The tall oak tree provided shade on a hot summer day.
The tall Texan ruffled some English feathers with his remarks.
After dinner she told me a tall tale about her pet.
To grow bigger/taller/older.
words.defineEn: (of a person or thing) having a height that is greater than what is thought to be the average height
words.defineVi: (của một người hoặc vật) có chiều cao lớn hơn chiều cao được cho là trung bình

examples: The best professional musicians start young.
The young actress received an award for her outstanding performance.
Those young people have some guts.
That young woman was close as an oyster!
The young man was a twenty-one-year-old college student.
words.defineEn: still in the earlier stages of life
words.defineVi: vẫn còn trong giai đoạn đầu của cuộc sống

examples: She wears her hair long.
This policy is no longer an effective means to an end.
Our players kept the pedal to the metal all season long.
The kids are under my feet all day long.
North Korea’s refusal had long been a sticking point.
words.defineEn: (of two points) having an above-average or big distance between them
words.defineVi: (của hai điểm) có khoảng cách trên trung bình hoặc lớn giữa chúng

examples: Keep your hair on.
Her hair reaches down to her waist.
His hair reached down to the middle of his back.
My grandmother's hair is gray.
Short hair really becomes you.
words.defineEn: the thin thread-like things that grow on our head
words.defineVi: những thứ giống như sợi chỉ mọc trên đầu chúng ta

examples: Short hair really becomes you.
The boss has a short fuse these days!
She made short work of her opponents.
We fell short of our goal in the competition.
As they say, short reckonings make long friends.
words.defineEn: having a below-average or small distance between two points
words.defineVi: có khoảng cách dưới trung bình hoặc nhỏ giữa hai điểm

examples: He had long, curly eyelashes that framed his eyes.
His hair is curly and brown.
The version of the gene here is allele curly.
Little Doris has curly hair now, and I don't anymore.
So she has the gene right there for curly hair.
words.defineEn: (of hair) having a lot of curls or waves
words.defineVi: (tóc) có nhiều lọn hoặc gợn sóng

examples: That contest wasn't fair!
The food was fair to middling.
Everyone should have a fair slice of the cake.
All of his teachers are going bananas over his science fair experiment.
They were fair people before it went to their heads.
words.defineEn: (of skin or hair) very light in color
words.defineVi: (của da hoặc tóc) có màu rất sáng

examples: The coffee in the mug was a dark.
The coffee table was a dark wood color.
Her dark hair was tied back in a ponytail.
The unique flavor of physalis pairs wonderfully with dark chocolate in desserts.
The dark clouds signaled that rain was on its way.
words.defineEn: (of hair, skin, or eyes) having a color close to brown or black
words.defineVi: (của tóc, da hoặc mắt) có màu gần như nâu hoặc đen

examples: Watch your mouth!
The girls watched the development of this relationship with incredulity.
A large crowd watched the game on Saturday.
Watch your head on the low ceiling.
Watch me!
words.defineEn: a small clock or timepiece worn on a strap on one's wrist or carried in the pocket
words.defineVi: một chiếc đồng hồ nhỏ hoặc đồng hồ đeo trên dây đeo trên cổ tay của một người hoặc mang trong túi

examples: he shaved his beard off.
Someone just bearded him in his den.
Today I walked straight into his office and bearded the lion in his den.
I will play Juliet, as soon as I shave my beard.
He had a beard that covered most of his face.
words.defineEn: the hair that grow on the chin and sides of a man’s face
words.defineVi: tóc mọc trên cằm và hai bên mặt của một người đàn ông

examples: My cat's fur is brown.
My father has brown eyes.
Brown algae have complex life cycles with genetic diversity.
We used brown sugar as a key ingredient in our homemade barbecue sauce.
On the day of the wedding, Brown experienced cold feet.
words.defineEn: having the color of chocolate ice cream
words.defineVi: có màu của kem sô cô la

examples: My father has brown eyes.
The woman has eyes like a hawk!
A vase on a side table caught his eye.
The actor's intense bedroom eyes added an extra layer of allure to his performance.
The intense gaze from across the room, eyes on stalks, left no doubt about his attraction.
words.defineEn: a body part on our face that we have two of and use for seeing
words.defineVi: một bộ phận cơ thể trên khuôn mặt của chúng ta mà chúng ta có hai và sử dụng để nhìn

examples: Blue blood is no guarantee of any particular merit, competence, or expertise.
Your friend really talks a blue streak!
The ocean's blue color amazed us.
They wore blue jeans to the party.
The little boy's favorite toy was a blue car.
words.defineEn: having the color of the ocean or clear sky at daytime
words.defineVi: có màu sắc của đại dương hoặc bầu trời quang đãng vào ban ngày

examples: Red wine leaves a stain.
The roses in the garden were red with velvety petals.
These shrubs produce bright red berries.
REd algae adds a burst of color to the underwater landscape.
The company has plunged $37 million into the red.
words.defineEn: having the color of tomatoes or blood
words.defineVi: có màu của cà chua hoặc máu

examples: The children scarfed down the pizza at the birthday party.
Someone has taken my scarf.
He scarfs his breakfast every morning before heading to work.
Should I add a scarf to this jacket or would it be gilding the lily?
Should I add a scarf to this jacket or would it be gilding the lily?
words.defineEn: a piece of cloth, worn around the neck or head, especially to keep warm
words.defineVi: một mảnh vải, đeo quanh cổ hoặc đầu, đặc biệt là để giữ ấm

examples: This suit is a steal at $80.
Part-time work would suit me right down to the ground.
He paired his suit with polished dress shoes.
That job would suit you to a tee.
My dad bought a stylish suit for his friend's wedding.
words.defineEn: a jacket with a pair of pants or a skirt that are made from the same cloth and should be worn together
words.defineVi: áo khoác với quần hoặc váy được làm từ cùng một loại vải và nên được mặc cùng nhau

examples: This shirt needs washing.
The shirt has a pocket on the chest for small items.
Should've bought that shirt.
Keeping his shirt on during intense moments.
What's your shirt made of?
words.defineEn: (usually for men) a piece of clothing worn on the upper half of the body, typically with a collar and sleeves, and with buttons down the front
words.defineVi: (thường dành cho nam giới) một bộ quần áo mặc ở nửa trên của cơ thể, thường có cổ áo và tay áo, và có các nút ở phía trước

examples: Which tie do you like best?
She finally loosened her tie after a long day at work.
Do I have to wear a tie?
He wore a tie to the wedding for a unique look.
She tied some strips of cloth around the wound to check the bleeding.
words.defineEn: a long and narrow piece of fabric tied around the collar, particularly worn by men
words.defineVi: một mảnh vải dài và hẹp buộc quanh cổ áo, đặc biệt được mặc bởi nam giới

examples: He was wearing jeans and a T-shirt.
She always wears a plain white T-shirt with jeans.
I spilled ketchup on my T-shirt while eating lunch.
She folded her T-shirt and put it neatly in the drawer.
I'm going to iron my T-shirt to make it look neat and wrinkle-free.
words.defineEn: a casual short-sleeved shirt with no collar, usually made of cotton
words.defineVi: một chiếc áo sơ mi ngắn tay bình thường không có cổ áo, thường được làm bằng cotton

examples: Is your jacket real leather?
The jacket sat beautifully on her shoulders.
Does this jacket go with this skirt?
I'll take the grey jacket.
I packed an extra jacket for the camping trip.
words.defineEn: a short item of clothing that we wear on the top part of out body, usually has sleeves and something in the front so we could close it
words.defineVi: một bộ quần áo ngắn mà chúng ta mặc ở phần trên cùng của cơ thể, thường có tay áo và một cái gì đó ở phía trước để chúng ta có thể đóng nó lại

examples: Her trainer was on hand to give advice.
As an animal trainer, it's important to build trust and get on well with the animals you work with.
We attend conferences, read and write journals, and collaborate with other trainers.
Even her fitness trainer was a sensation.
His trainer, Angelo Manzoli, said his career is ruined.
words.defineEn: a sports shoe with a rubber sole that is worn casually or for doing exercise
words.defineVi: một đôi giày thể thao có đế cao su được mang tùy tiện hoặc để tập thể dục

examples: My grandmother made a dress for me.
The bride's wedding dress is white.
She bought an expensive dress for a special occasion.
Where did you buy that dress?
This dress makes me look fat.
words.defineEn: a piece of clothing worn by girls and women that is made in one piece and covers the body down to the legs but has no separate part for each leg
words.defineVi: một bộ quần áo được mặc bởi các cô gái và phụ nữ được làm thành một mảnh và che cơ thể xuống chân nhưng không có phần riêng cho mỗi chân

words.defineEn: a pair of lenses set in a frame that rests on the nose and ears, which we wear to see more clearly
words.defineVi: một cặp thấu kính được đặt trong một khung nằm trên mũi và tai mà chúng ta đeo để nhìn rõ hơn

examples: I absolutely love your shoes.
His shoes were wearing at the heel.
My shoes are killing me.
She stole the shoes from under the assistant's nose.
I bought these shoes at half price.
words.defineEn: something that we wear to cover and protect our feet, generally made of strong materials like leather or plastic
words.defineVi: thứ gì đó mà chúng ta mặc để che và bảo vệ đôi chân của mình, thường được làm bằng vật liệu bền như da hoặc nhựa

examples: Many wearing shorts and T-SHIRTS.
words.defineEn: short pants that end either above or on the knees
words.defineVi: quần ngắn kết thúc ở trên hoặc trên đầu gối

examples: The boot is now on the other foot.
The fashionable boots added a trendy touch to her outfit.
He takes size 5 boots.
She wore ankle boots that emphasized her cankles.
I wore warm boots to trudge through the snowy streets.
words.defineEn: a type of strong shoe that covers the foot and ankle and often the lower part of the leg
words.defineVi: một loại giày chắc chắn bao gồm bàn chân và mắt cá chân và thường là phần dưới của chân

examples: This skirt has a stretchy waistband for comfort.
The skirt has a zipper at the back for easy wearing.
Her skirt almost reached the ground.
A skirt that reaches halfway down her legs
She paired her skirt with a white blouse and heels.
words.defineEn: a piece of clothing for girls or women that fastens around the waist and hangs down around the legs
words.defineVi: một bộ quần áo dành cho trẻ em gái hoặc phụ nữ buộc quanh eo và rủ xuống quanh chân

examples: We have to go cap in hand begging for funds.
He asked me, cap in hand, if I could help him out of his financial difficulties.
We'll need our thinking caps to solve this one.
They went to the teacher, cap in hand, and asked for more time to complete their project.
There's no way he'll go cap in hand to his brother.
words.defineEn: a type of soft flat hat with a visor, typically worn by men and boys, often as part of a uniform
words.defineVi: một loại mũ phẳng mềm có tấm che mặt, thường được đội bởi nam giới và trẻ em trai, thường là một phần của đồng phục

examples: Yet another candidate has thrown his hat into the ring.
Actually, I wear several different hats.
He was standing hat in hand before his teacher.
I took my hat off to his cooking skill.
Hold on to your hat as the stock market zigs and zags!
words.defineEn: a piece of clothing often with a brim that we wear on our heads, for warmth, as a fashion item or as part of a uniform
words.defineVi: một bộ quần áo thường có vành mà chúng ta đội trên đầu để giữ ấm, như một món đồ thời trang hoặc một phần của đồng phục
